18154633.admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

repnme.cdata!:
Yemen Arab Republic - Technical Assistance
            Project For the Petroleum Sector

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Technical
            Assistance to the Petroleum Sector Project is to provide
            broad technical support to the Ministry of Oil and Mineral
            Resources (MOMR) during the 1986-1992 period. Specifically,
            it would: (i) provide technical support through individual
            resident advisers; (ii) provide technical support through
            specialized firms for institutional development and
            investment planning, including monitoring of future
            investments and introduction of environmental control
            legislation; (iii) assist in developing a management
            information system (MIS) for accounting and a data base for
            exploration and production; and (iv) assist in training and
            manpower planning.
